CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 25, 1957, pg. 2, reads: "The Judge Votes - Common Pleas Court Judge Homer S. Brown was photographed last Tuesday in the act of depositing his ballot at the 12th District, Fifth Ward polling place.  His wife, Mrs. Wilhelmina Brown, rear, looks on.  Judge Brown was nominated by both parties on Tuesday.  He is the first of his race to preside in either one of the Allegheny County Courts. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Judge Homer S. Brown inserting ballot into box inscribed "County of Allegheny, Pittsburgh, 12 Dist." during primary election in polling center with Wilhelmina Byrd Brown standing in background
